Introduction


The aim of this report is the two most popular means of transportation used by students,which is bikes and trains.In addition,the report also discusses the advantages and disadvantages of bicycles and trains.Finally,some suggestions for university is made based on these two modes of transportation.


Most Popular Transport


﻿I﻿n this case,it is clear that most popular transportation used by students is bike.Cycling has many benefits.Firstly,it goes without saying that cycling reduces carbon dioxide emissions,so it is an environmentally friendly.Secondly,Cycling is an aerobic exercise.It is means that regular cycling can exerxise the body.Then the body gets a certain degree of exercise,which has many benefits for improving the body's resistance and immunity,and can also reduce the occurrence of various diseases.Furthermore,cycling is a relatively inexpensive way to travel.Therefore,it is a good choice for students whose family coditions are not very good or who need to save money.Finally,it can be very crowed during peak times.


But cycling also has some disadvantages.For example,there are no safe riding lanes on the road because most of them are occupied by cars to park vehicles.Secondly,the speed of the bicycle is very slow,and it is not suitable if you are in a hurry.Lastly,cycliing is an exhausting exercise an you sweat a lot after the ride,so you may need to change your clothes after the ride.


Second Most Popular Transport


Like cycling,taking a train is an environment friendly way to travel.But on the contrary,it is faster to take the train,and if it is a long hourney,the train ca save a lot of time.Finally,most cities have corresponding train station,it will be really convenient to travel between the two cities.


Trains also have many disadvantages,such as expensive tickets.This is because trains generally travel a long distance,so the longer the distance,the higher the price.Moreover,sometimes will be late or cancelled if people by trains.Usually due to weather reasons,in case of some extreme weather such as heavy rain,hail,etc.,train travel will be affected.


Recommendations


There are some advice for unnivercities when it comes to cycling.Firstly,delineate some safe areas dedicated to cycling and bicycle parking.Secondly,changing romms for students.Finally,place aportion of shared bikes on campus for students to use.Also,give the school some advice about the train.For example,start lessons later to avoid hush hour.In addition,part of the transportation subsidy for students.
